title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host local LLMs with a simple CLI and REST API; supports Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multimodal).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android-friendly, fluent API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby API with streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) usage.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama answers into Discord threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app to chat with local Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin
summary: OpenAI ChatGPT plugin spec implementation pointing to local Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama REST API for Node & browsers.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, etc.
